value: Town mostly populated by Tibetans in Dhorpatan Valley an important east-west route south of Dhaulagiri Himalaya
bazaar and administrative center of Dang District, Rapti Zone
bazaar in Dang district, Rapti Zone near Indian border on trade route north into Deukhuri Valley, Dang Valley and hill districts of Rapti Zone
administrative center of Rolpa District, Rapti Zone
bazaar and administrative center of Pyuthan District, Rapti Zone.  Locally called Khalanga.
administrative center of Salyan district, Rapti Zone

English may take you fairly far, but a little Nepali goes further.  As Asian languages go, this is certainly one of the easiest.  About half of the country speaks it as a second language, so the occasional mispronunciation or grammatical blunder won't brand you a foreigner.
